data.text: Thanks for participating! Looks like most of you (36%) would prefer a hike in the mountains but for many (33%) enjoying a delicious pizza in Rome would also be a choice for a romantic getaway. 🤗 We hope you had a lovely weekend! 💗
We have to confess - you truly make our hearts dance! Wishing you to always find love in everything that you do - happy Valentine’s Day from all of us at @airBaltic 💚 https://t.co/zitKpb2TKw
Doing what we love each day 💚 https://t.co/ju82qxSpeh

Love is ... making plans together 💚 This Valentine's Day, give your loved one @airBaltic gift card and plan your romantic getaway together for when you are ready to fly again. It can be used within one year for booking any flight: https://t.co/RyU9qeKsop https://t.co/VpcU5aOVo4

Valentine’s Day is just around the corner, love is in the air and it’s time for #airBalticQuiz! 💕
Imagine – you have the opportunity to visit one of these destinations for the romantic getaway. What would you choose?
@J_D_H_R Good evening! Please check your DMs!

@JurisSleiers Labdien! Ja runa ir par rezervāciju KL*****, par ko vaicājāt iepriekš, tās atmaksa ir tikusi veikta 2020. gada 8.septembrī. Aicinām vēlreiz pārbaudīt savu bankas kontu - gana daudzi pasažieri naudas atmaksu mēdz nepamanīt. Sīkāk - Jums tūlīt DM ziņā! Paldies par pacietību.

In 2020, we've handled more than 997 000 passenger inquiries made via call centre, e-mail and social media, which is 26% more than in the previous year. Read more: https://t.co/UWAVZdjgde https://t.co/CP2WMbwrLs

data.text:
#DidYouKnow that aircraft do not fly in ‘straight lines’ from point A to B. Different routes are being planned and trajectory mainly depends on airspace restrictions, regulations, wind, en-route weather and air navigation charges.
📸 by Lukasz Zak https://t.co/8tmHWtT3WG

@Alexeykas Labdien! Šobrīd plānojam atsākt tiešos reisus uz/no Tbilisi sākot ar 2.martu. Tomēr aicinām ņemt vērā, ka saistībā ar Covid attīstību/valdību ierobežojumiem grafikā joprojām iespējamas papildus izmaiņas, vai atcelšanas. Paldies par sapratni!

entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text: Good morning! ☀️ It’s not surprising that most of you (81%) are using digital maps and GPS for helping to make your way around new places. How about a little challenge next time travelling? 👀 Swipe the dust away from your paper maps and add some nostalgia to your travels!

@SigitsDuduris Labdien! Pirms ierašanās Latvijā, visiem pasažieriem ir jāaizpilda elektroniska anketa mājaslapā https://t.co/cqgpKUFmRq. Tā jāaizpilda ne ātrāk kā 48 stundas pirms Latvijas robežas šķērsošanas. Vairāk informācijas: https://t.co/1UiREyNnUt
@Mr_ITbot Paldies par precizējumu! Nodosim informāciju mūsu tehniskajai komandai.
@Mr_ITbot Labdien! Paldies, ka informējāt. Vai varam lūgt precizēt, kuru saiti atverot šādu kļūdas paziņojumu redzat?

@MadarsRazma Labdien! Lidojumu cena ir atkarīga gan no pieprasījuma konkrētajā reisā, gan lidojumu pieejamības, kas šobrīd tiek ierobežota dažādu iemeslu dēļ. Mājaslapas norādītā cena un lidojumu pieejamība ir informatīva un var mainīties laikā, kamēr tiek veikta rezervācija.

@Lasma0506 Labdien! Gaidām oficiālu informāciju un rīkojumu no atbilstošajām iestādēm (NOTAM). Tiklīdz tāds tiks saņemts, tiešie reisi konkrētajā periodā sistēmā tiks atcelti. Paredzam, ka tas notiks jau tuvākajā laikā. Pateicamies par sapratni.

data.text: #airBalticQuiz is here! Whilst we are dreaming to travel the world again, it would be interesting to get to know your travel habits. 🌍 Which cartography type do you prefer using when exploring new destinations? 🤔

entity.name: Celebrating Leonardo da Vinci on the 500th anniversary of his death
entity.description: The artist, scientist and inventor who is widely regarded as a Renaissance genius died in France on May 2, 1519.

data.text: It’s #ThrowbackThursday! Did you know that on this day 11 years ago we carried a self-portrait of Leonardo Da Vinci on its first-ever flight from Rome via Riga to Tallinn? This happened 500 years after the artist first sketched his aircraft models! https://t.co/IgBRHTVF7u

Another Wednesday with some facts! #DidYouKnow that last year we carried 195 000 passengers in Lithuania and 225 000 passengers in Estonia? We ensured the essential connection between the Baltics and Europe!
📷 by Kobi Ben Navi https://t.co/w7kUNsKFE0

We have achieved some very important targets on our way to becoming a more sustainable airline. Visit our new sustainability site where you can read more about our sustainability goals and efforts towards greener skies: https://t.co/ndbvDSxcdf https://t.co/zGoVRcCrPo

@Bruno03151405 Labdien! Tā kā atpūtas braucieni lielākajā daļā Eiropas pašlaik ir ierobežoti, cenas ir īslaicīgi pielāgotas, lai atspoguļotu esošo pieprasījumu starp ceļotājiem, kuru vairums pārvietojas svarīgos nolūkos.
@Radovics @riga_airport ...nepastāv nekāda korelācija starp aviopārvadājumu apmēru un Covid-19 izplatību. (2/2)

@Radovics @riga_airport Labrīt! Aizvadītā gada pēdējā ceturksnī, kad vīrusa izplatība Latvijā un Eiropā ievērojami pieauga, ar aviāciju Latvijā tika ievesti vidēji vien ap sešiem Covid-19 pozitīviem pasažieriem nedēļā. Dati apliecina, ka pie augstas vietējās vīrusa pārneses... (1/2)

What else do we carry apart of our lovely passengers? 💚 In 2020, we carried 7.5 million kilograms of mail and cargo on our aircraft fleet. The demand for air freight per flight increased, and we were proud to maintain our status as the largest cargo operator at @riga_airport. https://t.co/A2wkGjurXr

Hello! 👋 Results for the #airBalticQuiz are in! This time only 27% of you clicked the right answer - Stockholm and London.
As of today the newest February/March issue of our Baltic Outlook inflight magazine is out! Check it out here: https://t.co/qSid5usLt7
@Funtskerl Hello! We're sorry to hear of this. Please share with us in a DM your booking reference number, and we'll take a look.

data.text:
It's not that easy to travel these days - entry rules in each country are different and subject to change on a short notice. To make this easier for you, we offer a special widget with all the latest details!
Try it now: https://t.co/CJ45i0ZUDs https://t.co/nTeMqxeP4j
@Qualityresort @riga_airport Thanks for the kind words, Jerry! Hopefully see you on board again soon! ☺️

According to @riga_airport, in 2020 @airBaltic has maintained its market leader position, by carrying 57% of all passengers to the Latvian capital. In 2020, we carried 1.14 million passengers to and from Riga. Read more: https://t.co/aXS30fo16u https://t.co/roUxpaGHKF

Are you ready for weekly #airBalticQuiz? 🤓 Our inflight magazine Baltic Outlook is full of surprises and useful tips. Can you guess which were the 'cities of the month', included in the last issue of the magazine? 📰

data.text: Stay safe, stay connected! We thank all our passengers who take the necessary precautions while travelling. Find out what we do to keep you safe while flying: https://t.co/AIHif4DHYF https://t.co/kQgmc92ehd
@AivarsTennisUK Currently there are no such plans, however who knows what the future may bring...? 😇

@Hamosnomejodas https://t.co/O8lITmWnh5
As advised, it is also passenger's obligation to check for all the current entry restrictions as they are changing very rapidly. We are doing everything in our power to provide passengers with the latest information: https://t.co/wdHZ5yiM8s

@Hamosnomejodas On top of that airBaltic in cooperation with local laboratories in the Baltics now provides an option to request and make a rapid test shortly before the flight to comply with all the new regulations. Thank you.

@Hamosnomejodas We also have informed all passengers about this, as well as put information on our webpage/check-in pages. However it is also passenger's obligation to check for all the current entry restrictions as they are changing very rapidly.

@Hamosnomejodas Hi! If you are referring to the new regulation from the Dutch authorities, then we would like to inform that it has been imposed by them and not us. We as an airline and passengers traveling to the destination need to comply with all the regulations.
@Qualityresort That's an interesting suggestion! Thank you, Jerry!

#DidYouKnow that 14 of our Airbus A220-300 fleet planes are named after Latvian cities and towns in honour of Latvia's centenary? They were chosen by public in online voting which took place in the autumn of 2018! https://t.co/QbvLxKJHAV

urls.title: Cheap flights to Baltics, Europe & Middle East | airBaltic
urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

data.text: @RzaRza Labrīt! Reiss šajā datumā nav paredzēts. Lidojumi uz/no Romas martā paredzēti reizi nedēļā - svētdienās, savukārt ar aviācijas vasaras sezonas sākšanos marta beigās - 2x nedēļā līdz pat jūnijam. Sīkākas detaļas mūsu mājaslapā https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg!
@eKhanateWorld See you on board!

We have established and received certification of our brand-new Maintenance Training Organization that, being a part of airBaltic Training, will provide training and certification for aircraft technicians. Read more: https://t.co/9WrTbEKkG3 https://t.co/BHQaClvlAf
Thanks for participating! Most of you (75%) absolutely prefer to enjoy the views outside during the flight. Let's hope 2021 will bring more of these magical moments! ✨ https://t.co/JEA8mlOl89

@_colde_ Hello! In this case we would kindly invite you to contact our Reservations team - please find their phone number and e-mail address at the bottom of your bookings confirmation e-mail. Thank you!
@natakrata @riga_airport papildu informāciju par testa veikšanas iespējām, izmaksām un apmaksas iespējām. Paldies!

@natakrata @riga_airport Labdien! Jā, pasažieriem, kas lido uz Nīderlandi, ir iespēja veikt testu lidostā. Bet ir jāveic priekšapmaksa. Tāpēc aicinām Jūs sazināties ar mūsu Zvanu centru - Jūsu rezervācijas apstiprinājuma e-pasta apakšā ir norādīts parastā tarifa tālruņa numurs. Kolēģi sniegs...
Hello, Friday and hello #airBalticQuiz! One of the many perks of flying is astonishing and surprising views outside the window. However, we would love to know - do you prefer:

@yourbakaloli Hello! That's correct! As according to the latest information from the Government, as of January 25th, PCR test will be mandatory which is not older than 72 hours before flight departure time.

Since the first C check in 2019, we have continued our maintenance program, completing a full scope of maintenance on seven @Airbus A220-300 aircraft. C check is an important part of any airline operation, ensuring that aircraft meets highest safety and efficiency standards. https://t.co/2pFrK6snvr
@NoCoffeeHere @Airwaysfoodie @riga_airport Both plans sound amazing to us! See you on board and in lovely Riga!

@klindzans Paldies par precizējumu. Tādā gadījumā nodosim Jūsu tvītus atbildīgajiem kolēģiem un sazināsimies arī ar mūsu pārstāvjiem Parīzes lidostā, lai precizētu detaļas. Paldies par sapratni šajā periodā un vēlam jauku lidojumu!

@klindzans Pēc mūsu rīcībā esošās informācijas un norādījumiem, kas ir tikuši doti no atbildīgajām iestādēm, 'tikai' antivielu tests nenorāda, vai pasažieris vairs nav infekciozs. Ir nepieciešams arī medicīnisks apstiprinājums, kā jau norādījām un arī tika minēts Jūsu atsūtītajā bildē.

@klindzans Labdien! Varam apstiprināt, ka antivielu tests ir derīgs un tiek pieņemts, taču tikai tādos gadījumos, kad tas tiek uzrādīts kopā ar medicīnisku apstiprinājumu (vai ārsta zīmi), ka konkrētais pasažieris vairs nav infekciozs - kā jau rakstīts arī Jūsu ekrānšāviņā.

data.text: @Met_Ju @Sat_Min @Talis_L @qatarairways Paldies! Pasažierus aicinām būt atbildīgiem un nekontaktēties ar citiem pasažieriem lidojuma laikā, tostarp ievērot distanci gan lidostā, gan nedrūzmēties lidmašīnā un izkāpjot no tās. Esam sarūgtināti, ka daļa no pasažieriem izturās vieglprātīgi pret šiem nosacījumiem.

@Met_Ju @Sat_Min @Talis_L Labrīt! Vai varam lūgt konkretizēt, kādus pārkāpumus Jūs novērojāt? Lūdzam ņemt arī vērā, ka konkrētā saite attiecās uz iekšējiem sabiedriskā transporta pārvadājumiem. Sīkākas detaļas par airBaltic veselības aizsardzību mūsu lidojumos: https://t.co/Vxr3L0q8qV
#DidYouKnow that you do not need a key to start a plane? In our Airbus A220-300 everything is done with a combination of buttons and switches. https://t.co/F8xOZe7lQv
@grifpeterson Hey, Grif, we're happy to see us in your playlist! It was so fun to make the video, we're glad you enjoyed it! 💚
@badmoodtm Thank you. In that case our colleagues will investigate this and get back to you. Thank you.
@KristineGarina Labdien! Esam nodevuši Jūsu tvītu aģentam, šobrīd mūsu rīcībā nav sīkākas informācijas, taču lūgsim izskatīt atsūtīto papildus informāciju un sniegt atbildi! Paldies par pacietību.
@viktorsevaldin 🥶️

data.text: Thank you for taking part in our quiz! Majority of you (70%) got the right answer - the coldest airport in the world is Yakutsk Airport in Russia, with temperatures regularly reaching -40˚C during the winter! ❄️

urls.title: Submit a claim | Contact us | airBaltic
urls.description: Left your belongings on the plane? Was your baggage delayed? You can submit a claim about baggage, flight irregularities and more to airBaltic online.

data.text:
@badmoodtm Good morning! We are saddened to hear about such unpleasant situation, our apologies. We kindly ask you to submit us a claim: https://t.co/N04NoZd2An
Our team will review and investigate this situation more closer.

data.text: Safety is the main priority of our airline. We have passed operation safety audit on the compliance with the @IATA Operations Safety standards that was recently carried out by audit organization Aviation Quality Services. Read more: https://t.co/81FuRelUUM https://t.co/XKtgSwmgN2
@Max24948076 Thanks! All 👏 to the author Ilya Tomkovich!

#DidYouKnow that in freezing conditions, a special process called 'de-icing' is being done to the aircraft? It is process of removing snow, ice or frost from the plane's surface. This also prevents ice formation on flight surfaces during take-off.
📸 Ilya Tomkovich https://t.co/WU3R2f5PIV

@JorshLv Jā, protams, ir arī izņēmuma gadījumi, un par tiem sīkāk lasāms mūsu norādītajā saitē kopā ar tvītu. Visiem pārējiem pasažieriem, pēc valdības lēmuma, ir nepieciešams uzrādīt negatīvu Covid testu.
@annszi Correct!

airBaltic atgādina, ka, sākot ar 15. janvāri, visiem pasažieriem ar lidojuma galamērķi Latvijas Republikā būs jāuzrāda apliecinājums par negatīvu Covid-19 testu, kas veikts ne ilgāk kā pirms 72 stundām. Sīkāk: https://t.co/3KXTamUyug https://t.co/hMxlgkddbR

airBaltic reminds its passengers that starting of January 15, all travelers with their final destination in the Republic of Latvia need to have a negative Covid-19 test result that is not older than 72 hours upon entry into the country. Read more: https://t.co/0qwWSFe1vS https://t.co/Bi5IWPoSqI
@koleegjis Sīkāks apkopojums atrodams arī mūsu mājaslapā: https://t.co/WOPF8AL0zt

@koleegjis Precizējot ar kolēģiem varam informēt, ka tests šādā situācijā (tranzīts, ar biļetēm turpmākajiem reisiem) nav nepieciešams, atvainojamies par misēkli. Taču atkārtoti uzsveram, ka daudzu valstu noteiktie nosacījumi šobrīd mainās ļoti strauji, tāpēc aicinām tiem sekot līdzi!

@koleegjis Labdien, Edgar! Informējam, ka visiem mūsu pasažieriem ar iegādātām rezervācijām ir pieejams arī standarta tarifa tālruņa numurs - tas norādīts rezervācijas apstiprinājuma e-pastā. Paldies!

Our air filter removes 99.99% of all particles as small as bacteria and viruses and supplies a complete exchange of fresh air every 2-3 minutes. Read more: https://t.co/Oh2lbNYtEX https://t.co/gmXYXVDPfV

data.text: Thank you for participating in our first quiz of the year! 🎉 Most of you are seeking to travel more and experience all of the perks of doing so. 🤗 Visit our webpage https://t.co/Zibba9Nx4A to catch some inspiration for your next vacation!

data.text: @yourbakaloli Hello! As this is a new decision at this moment we do not yet have all the details, however we will inform about that in the upcoming days and also our webpage: https://t.co/QIoNeWjHbT
@manish_dehraj Hello! Could you please clarify your question? Please share with us your booking reference number in a private message. Thank you.

Last year, we've carried 73% less passengers than the year before. 2020 will go in history as the toughest year commercial aviation has yet seen. Read more of @airBaltic past year's results: https://t.co/kevAf4pxFx https://t.co/oR4vpL4AzQ
First week of 2021 is coming to an end and it’s time for this year’s first #airBalticQuiz! Let’s start the year by setting some goals. In 2021 I wish to:

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: We are truly proud to be the first airline to receive the highest Skytrax COVID-19 Safety Rating. This rating reflects our commitment to provide safe travels during the pandemic, following various hygiene and safety procedures. Read more: https://t.co/i1ETuPFdCQ https://t.co/3i1SnipfZg

@intothepits Good morning! It is possible to book the tickets on our webpage for flights approximately year in advance. However please note that not all the schedule for Winter 2022 has been finalised yet. Thank you!
@Jana_Or_Lova Labvakar! Lūdzam privāti DM ziņā atsūtīt Jūsu rezervācijas numuru. Paldies.

Safety is our top priority! #DidYouKnow that inside the passenger cabin, the airflow is supplied from above the overhead compartment and flows directed towards the floor, eliminating airflow along the cabin and minimising lateral air transmission among passenger rows? https://t.co/hcrSXeY8oL
@Vanags7 @Annija_Marta @normundsbergs Sīkāk par detaļām mūsu Bloga ierakstā: https://t.co/bbrA6dyIv8

@Vanags7 @Annija_Marta @normundsbergs Gaiss lidmašīnas salonā tiek nepārtraukti papildināts ar svaigu gaisu jau no brīža, kad tiek ieslēgti lidmašīnas dzinēji vai papildu barošanas avoti. Tostarp mūsu Airbus flote ir aprīkota ar gaisa recirkulācijas sistēmu un augstas efektivitātes cieto daļiņu gaisa (HEPA) filtriem.

@Annija_Marta @Vanags7 @normundsbergs Sveiki! Atvainojamies par to, pieļaujam, ka kāds tehnisks iemesls (ja sēdvietas netika iepriekš iegādātas, bet sistēma nevarēja nodrošināt tās kopā kāda konkrēta iemesla dēļ), taču priecājamies, ka gaisa kuģa apkalpe šajā situācijā ir palīdzējusi. Vēlam jauku lidojumu!

@EdvardsV Labvakar! Atvainojamies par to, pieļaujam, ka kāds tehnisks iemesls (ja sēdvietas netika iepriekš iegādātas, bet sistēma nevarēja nodrošināt tās kopā kāda konkrēta iemesla dēļ). Lūdzam sazināties ar mūsu gaisa kuģa apkalpi, kolēģi noteikti palīdzēs. Vēlam jauku lidojumu!
Very proud to be ranked among world’s TOP20 for COVID-19 compliant airlines by @Airline_ratings. Read the full article here: https://t.co/070yISgQai https://t.co/aNfcjCD26i
